content: For some reason, the built-in function get_frame_size() is not returning what it says on its docstring. Instead of returning a tuple of years and months, it is returning a tuple containing (date1, date2, 0) where date1 and date2 are Date objects. What is causing this?
subject: Built-in function Error: get_frame_size()

content: I have the same issue and I am also very confused. :(

Can’t say for sure, but if you’re using set_frame_size() you might be providing incorrect arguments to it

Edit: Other common problems I've seen are people not including the interval boundaries in their frame_data(), or not testing for some edge cases in their is_equal, is_before and is_after functions
